name: SOS-Consult GmbH
goal: To provide advisory and other services to clients in Europe, inter alia, in the field of Regulatory Compliance and European Affairs as well as participation in EU stakeholder engagement.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Environment, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , General and Institutional Affairs, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Trade
euInitiatives: Industrial policy, innovation, regulation as pertaining to environmental quality standards, resource efficiency, circular economy, waste, consumer protection, chemicals management (REACH, CLP Regulation), sustainable use of natural resources, raw materials, occupational health and safety, transport of dangerous goods and products, food contact materials and construction.
